name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CineLens - Fetch movies & TV shows data

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get info instantly for movies and TV shows

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily access information about movies and TV shows while browsing the web with this user-friendly extension. Highlight any text on a webpage or open Netflix with a title on the screen, press Alt+S or click the extension icon to automatically fill in the search input, and hit enter to get comprehensive details from the OMDb API. You may also manually enter the title and year input fields.

Key Features:
1. Highlight Text: Instantly fetch information based on highlighted text.
2. Netflix Integration: Automatically retrieves details if a title is open on Netflix.
3. Customization: Choose which information you want to display, including release date, runtime, director, and more.

Please note: For optimal results, use the original language title on Netflix. We are actively working on scaling the service to handle increasing usage.
